Summary: Multi colored lights, red, green, blue,white pulsating and moving south east very slowly and very high
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Port Charlotte
There were no other sightings in Port Charlotte on or around August 25th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsMy Roomate took the trash out to the curb and saw the lights. came in and woke me up. we went out and looked at ufo with binoculars, then i used my digital video camera to get low grade video. the ufo seemed to be stationary then moved very slowlt to the south east. a small private plane flew by in a different part of sky. the ufo is definately not a plane or blimp ! The ufo was in sight for 30 min. it slowly moved out of sight. icould make out the seperate lights when i first saw the object. then they merged into a single speck the farther away it moved.
